products.name: ADESIVA REG-999
products.description: ADESIVA REG-999 is a modified polymer-based adhesive that comes in fine powder form with excellent adhesion properties. Suitable for indoor applications, this adhesive is most suitable for fixing Clay, Ceramic and vitrified floor tiles up to 2ft x 2ft.
products.fullDescription: Available in Grey colour, REG-999 offers superior crack bridging properties and is suitable for all types of tiles, making it an ideal choice for professional tiling applications.

products.name: ADESIVA GEL-W 100
products.description: ADESIVA GEL-W 100 is a Cementitious Tile Adhesive formulated with an enhanced thixotropic fluid properties system for improved stability and strength. This high-quality polymer-modified fine powder is designed to enhance tile adhesive performance.
products.fullDescription: When mixed with water, it forms a smooth, anti-settling mixture that ensures uniform spreadability and excellent workability. Available in White colour, it's perfect for both interior and exterior applications.

products.name: Oil & Water Repellent - 320
products.description: ADESIVA Water Repellent / Oil & Water Repellent comes in two variants viz; water repellent and both oil & water repellent. Both products penetrate deep into the stone surface and fill-up the capillaries.
products.fullDescription: Post curing, prevents the penetration of liquid based stains, and as well protects from other stains on natural & artificial stone surface. Retains original colour of the stone.

products.name: Stain Protector - 330 (Nano Effect)
products.description: ADESIVA Stain Protector - 330 is a high quality organic based premium product, which penetrates deep into the stone surface and fill-up capillaries.
products.fullDescription: Post curing, prevents from the penetration of oil, grease and water with excellent stain repellent and UV resistance properties.

products.name: Granites & Tiles Cleaner - 201
products.description: ADESIAV Tiles Cleaner - 201 is a water based cleaning agent. Removes stain, building dirt and residue on the floor surface of any kind. Tiles Cleaner 201 is free from hydrochloric acid and corrosive fumes.
products.fullDescription: Tiles Cleaner 201 is most suitable for cleaning home, workshop and industry segments. Can be easily cleaned using brush, cloth & abrasives.

products.name: Marble Cement Cleaner - 200
products.description: ADESIVA Cement Cleaner is a special water based detergent which removes residues like cement, building dirt, rustic stains, etc
products.fullDescription: from the surface of the marble / natural stones / artificial stones / ceramic tiles etc. Preserves the structure & colour of the marble surface.

products.name: Cement Cleaner - 208
products.description: ADESIVA Cement Cleaner is a special water based detergent which removes residues like cement, building dirt, rustic stains, etc
products.fullDescription: from the surface of the marble / natural stones / artificial stones / ceramic tiles etc. Preserves the structure & colour of the marble surface.

products.name: Paint Remover - 250
products.description: ADESIVA Paint Remover - 250 is a solvent based highly effective & specifically formulated to remove spilled paint stains on the floor surface of any kind. Paint Remover - 250 is free from Hydrochloric acid and it does not affect the original look of the floor surface.
products.fullDescription: User Friendly - Apply with the help of a paint roller and leave it for 10 - 20 minute and there after rinse with water and scrub by using clean Coir Brush / Scotch Brite.

products.name: Neutral Cleaner - 230
products.description: ADESIVA Neutral Cleaner 230 is a water based which is specifically formulated to remove acid stains and water marks on the floor surface of any kind. For critical stains, repeated cleaning process to be followed for better results.
products.fullDescription: User friendly, can be easily applied by using roller or brush and allow it for at least 30 minutes curing time followed by rinsing & cleaning with water, the residues on the floor surface.

products.name: Epoxy Remover - 242
products.description: ADESIVA  Epoxy Remover - 242 is a solvent based epoxy remover highly effective on Lumps and larger epoxy residues, polyester grout, fillers and mastic, enamels & synthetic materials in general deposited on the surface of natural / artificial stones.
products.fullDescription: GEN-666 comes in fine powder form and has enhanced adhesion properties. Suitable for indoor application fixing vitrified and natural stone tiles for floor & wall for size of the tile upto 4ft × 4ft.

products.name: Marble Rust Remover - 240
products.description: ADESIVA GEN-666 is a modified with high polymer strength adhesive.
products.fullDescription: GEN-666 comes in fine powder form and has enhanced adhesion properties. Suitable for indoor application fixing vitrified and natural stone tiles for floor & wall for size of the tile upto 4ft × 4ft.

products.name: Granite Rust Remover - 253
products.description: ADESIVA GEN-666 is a modified with high polymer strength adhesive.
products.fullDescription: GEN-666 comes in fine powder form and has enhanced adhesion properties. Suitable for indoor application fixing vitrified and natural stone tiles for floor & wall for size of the tile upto 4ft × 4ft.

products.name: Epoxy Grout Plain Shade
products.description: ADESIVA Epoxy Grout is specially formulated and available in 2K & 3K pack system for horizontal and vertical application. This premium grout is a combination of Resin & Hardener, engineered for easy application and hassle-free maintenance.
products.fullDescription: The epoxy grout system provides exceptional durability with high abrasion resistance and excellent bonding properties. Its stain-resistant formula and micro-fine texture ensure long-lasting tile joints that maintain their appearance over time. Available in both solid and metallic finishes with over 30 color options to match any design aesthetic.

products.name: Universal Cleaner - 248
products.description: ADESIVA Universal Cleaner - 248 is a water based highly effective universal cleaner which can be used on any kind of floor surface & faucets.
products.fullDescription: Universal Cleaner is capable of removing almost all type of stains like water marks, oily surface, scaling, rust, etc. Universal Cleaner’s uniqueness is it does not affect or discolour the original colour of the surface of the tiles & faucets and looks clean & shiny.

products.name: Transparent - 110/111
products.description: ADESIVA Transparent/Crystal Mastic is a gel/liquid based with high resistance to UV and provides uniform colouring along with all the functional properties of the king product

products.name: Crystal - 142/143
products.description: ADESIVA Transparent/Crystal Mastic is a gel/liquid based with high resistance to UV and provides uniform colouring along with all the functional properties of the king product

products.name: White - 120/130
products.description: Wilber’s ADESIVA MASTIC is an enhanced polyester resin based two component system formulated with mineral filling agents with good workability.
products.fullDescription: Mastic has extraordinary bonding and excellent filling properties on both natural and artificial stones. Easy to apply on both vertical and horizontal surfaces and even on critical joints with good polishing possibility.

products.name: Cream - 121/131
products.description: Wilber’s ADESIVA MASTIC is an enhanced polyester resin based two component system formulated with mineral filling agents with good workability.
products.fullDescription: Mastic has extraordinary bonding and excellent filling properties on both natural and artificial stones. Easy to apply on both vertical and horizontal surfaces and even on critical joints with good polishing possibility.

products.name: Dark - 122/132
products.description: Wilber’s ADESIVA MASTIC is an enhanced polyester resin based two component system formulated with mineral filling agents with good workability.
products.fullDescription: Mastic has extraordinary bonding and excellent filling properties on both natural and artificial stones. Easy to apply on both vertical and horizontal surfaces and even on critical joints with good polishing possibility.

products.name: Black - 123/133
products.description: Wilber’s ADESIVA MASTIC is an enhanced polyester resin based two component system formulated with mineral filling agents with good workability.
products.fullDescription: Mastic has extraordinary bonding and excellent filling properties on both natural and artificial stones. Easy to apply on both vertical and horizontal surfaces and even on critical joints with good polishing possibility.

products.name: Epox - 7005 (Transparent Resin)
products.description: ADESIVA Transparent Resin – EPOX 7005 is a clear Polyester-Based Resin formulated for bonding, filling, and repairing marble and natural stone surfaces. It offers excellent transparency, enhancing the natural color and texture of the stone without yellowing over time.
products.fullDescription: Its fast-curing and strong adhesive properties make it ideal for sealing cracks, filling voids, and surface restoration. The resin is easy to polish, providing a smooth, glossy finish that blends seamlessly with the stone's surface.

products.name: UV protected Colour tint
products.description: UV Protected Colour Tint are polyester pigments used for colouring all type of mastic so as to sub-merge with the colour of natural stones. The pigment dispersion is free from plasticizers.
products.fullDescription: The Carrier resin combines chemically with the moulding grade of commercial resin while curing. UV protected Colour Tint exhibit high gloss and has a very good dispersion property, UV resistant, Uniform colouring and excellent bonding properties are an additional features of UV Protected Colour Tint.

products.name: Epoxy Adhesive - 152
products.description: ADESIVA Epoxy Adhesive - 152 is an Epoxy Resin based two component system.

products.name: Epoxy Adhesive - 152
products.description: ADESIVA Epoxy Adhesive - 152 is an Epoxy Resin based two component system.

products.name: Natural Stone Back Sealer (W) - 340
products.description: ADESIVA Natural Stone Back Sealer is a penetrative premium product which comes in both Solvent & Water Base.

products.name: PU Adhesive
products.description: ADESIVA Polyurethane Adhesive is a premium, two-component adhesive designed for strong, durable bonding across diverse materials.
products.fullDescription: ADESIVA Polyurethane Adhesive is a versatile, high-performance adhesive designed for strong bonding across a wide range of materials, including wood, metal, concrete, stone, and ceramics. It offers superior flexibility, excellent chemical and moisture resistance, and outstanding durability, making it ideal for both interior and exterior applications.

products.name: Marble Epoxy - 999
products.description: Marble Epoxy is highly fluid in nature most suitable for filling pores & deep cracks on the surface on the surface of marble slabs.
products.fullDescription: Marble Epoxy - fluid form deeply penetrates into the pore spare on the marble surface. Highly transparent in nature, provides good polishing properties with excellent coverage and enhances the overall quality of the marble surface.

products.name: Marble Epoxy - 995
products.description: Marble Epoxy is highly fluid in nature most suitable for filling pores & deep cracks on the surface on the surface of marble slabs.
products.fullDescription: Marble Epoxy - fluid form deeply penetrates into the pore spare on the marble surface. Highly transparent in nature, provides good polishing properties with excellent coverage and enhances the overall quality of the marble surface.

products.name: Granito Colour Enhancer - 400
products.description: ADESIVA Granito Colour Enhancer - 400 is a solvent stone care product containing reactive modified siloxanes. Forms a thin shiny layer on surface of the natural stone and enriches the natural colour of the stone surface. Granito Colour Enhancer improves colour depth with non-yellowing properties and resistant to water & dirt pick up

products.name: Shiner - 2000
products.description: ADESIVA Shiner - 2000 is a solvent based stone care product. It forms a thin shiny layer on the surface of natural stone and enhances natural colour of the stone. Shiner 2000 gives a soft glow, resistant to water and dirt pick up, retains wet look on the stone surface for a long period.

products.name: Surface Protective Coating - 315
products.description: Surface Protective Coating – 315 is a premium protective coating designed to enhance and safeguard outdoor pavers.
products.fullDescription: It provides superior durability, weather resistance, and an aesthetic boost to exterior natural stone surfaces.  Enhances the color vibrancy of pavers, creating a rich, wet-look shine & elegant finish.

products.name: Cera polish - 450
products.description: ADESIVA Cera Polish 450 is for the polishing treatment on natural stones like marbles, agglomerates and terrazzo.
products.fullDescription: On marbles, it enhances the lustre of the polished soft stone and eliminates the superficial defects & accents the colour. Cera Polish - 450 protects from sunlight and has stain resistance on marble surface.

products.name: Gloss Coat - 990 (W)
products.description: Gloss Coat -990 is a premium protective coating designed to enhance and safeguard the outdoor natural stones with UV & Abrasion resistant. Available in High-Gloss and Matte Finish, it provides superior durability, weather resistance, and an aesthetic boost to exterior surfaces.
products.fullDescription: It provides superior durability, weather resistance, and an aesthetic boost to exterior natural stone surfaces.  Enhances the color vibrancy of pavers, creating a rich, wet-look shine & elegant finish.

products.name: ADESIVA GEN-666
products.description: ADESIVA GEN-666 is a modified with high polymer strength adhesive.
products.fullDescription: GEN-666 comes in fine powder form and has enhanced adhesion properties. Suitable for indoor application fixing vitrified and natural stone tiles for floor & wall for size of the tile upto 4ft × 4ft.

products.name: High-Gloss Marble Powder
products.description: ADESIVA Marble Polishing Powder is a high-quality, fine-grade polishing compound specifically formulated to restore the natural shine and luster of marble surfaces.
products.fullDescription: It effectively removes light scratches, stains, and etching while enhancing the stone’s color and clarity. Suitable for both residential and commercial applications, this polishing powder provides a durable, high-gloss finish without damaging the marble’s integrity.

products.name: High-Gloss Marble Powder
products.description: ADESIVA Marble Polishing Powder is a high-quality, fine-grade polishing compound specifically formulated to restore the natural shine and luster of marble surfaces.
products.fullDescription: It effectively removes light scratches, stains, and etching while enhancing the stone’s color and clarity. Suitable for both residential and commercial applications, this polishing powder provides a durable, high-gloss finish without damaging the marble’s integrity.

products.name: High-Gloss Marble Densifier
products.description: ADESIVA Densifier is a high-performance, penetrating treatment specifically formulated to strengthen and harden marble surfaces.
products.fullDescription: It works by chemically reacting with the calcium compounds in marble, creating a dense, durable surface with enhanced resistance to wear, staining, and moisture. Ideal for both residential and commercial applications, ADESIVA Densifier improves surface longevity while maintaining the natural beauty and gloss of marble.

products.name: High-Gloss Marble Densifier
products.description: ADESIVA Densifier is a high-performance, penetrating treatment specifically formulated to strengthen and harden marble surfaces.
products.fullDescription: It works by chemically reacting with the calcium compounds in marble, creating a dense, durable surface with enhanced resistance to wear, staining, and moisture. Ideal for both residential and commercial applications, ADESIVA Densifier improves surface longevity while maintaining the natural beauty and gloss of marble.

products.name: Jet Nero Black - 460
products.description: ADESIVA Jet Nero Black - 460 is a solvent based black colour stone care product containing reactive modified siloxanes.  Jet Nero Black - 460 penetrates deep into the stone surface and fill up the capillaries making it smooth natural surface. Jet Nero Black - 460 is resistant to UV, water & dirt pick up, has non-yellowing properties and maintains fresh look of the stones.

products.name: ADESIVA MGV-333
products.description: ADESIVA MGV-333 is a latex based which has high flexible properties even after hard dry.
products.fullDescription: MGV-333 comes in fine powder particles. Elastic in nature and suitable for fixing vitrified, Mosaic, Porcelain & all natural stone tiles on Exterior & Interior floor & wall for all sizes including large format tiles.

products.fullDescription: The epoxy grout system provides exceptional durability with high abrasion resistance and excellent bonding properties. Its stain-resistant formula and micro-fine texture ensure long-lasting tile joints that maintain their appearance over time. products.description: ADESIVA Natural Stone Back Sealer is a penetrative premium product which comes in both Solvent & Water Base.

products.name: LAPIZO BOND FAST SET(SMALL)
products.description: LAPIZO BOND FAST SET(SMALL) is a polymer-modified, grey cement-based tile adhesive for fixing ceramic tiles such as ceramic and new floor tiles.
products.fullDescription: This fast-setting adhesive provides excellent bonding strength and is perfect for quick installation projects where time is of the essence.

products.name: LAPIZO BOND FAST SET
products.description: LAPIZO BOND FAST SET is suitable for fixing natural stones, clay, terracotta, and vitrified tiles of regular size on floor and wall.
products.fullDescription: This premium fast-setting adhesive offers superior bonding properties and is ideal for professional tiling applications requiring quick turnaround times.
